testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts

testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "Mohamed" and last name "Kamal"...................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email........................................................passed And user enters company.....................................................passed And user fills Password fields..............................................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.name: Scenario: user could create successful order
testcase.system-out: Given user opens homepage...................................................passed When user selects Apple MacBook.............................................passed And user clicks on add to cart button for Apple MacBook.....................passed Then product is added successfully..........................................passed When user selects Asus Laptop...............................................passed And user clicks on add to cart button for Asus Laptop.......................passed Then product is added successfully..........................................passed Given user clicks on shopping cart link.....................................passed And user accepts the agreement..............................................passed When user clicks on checkout button.........................................passed And user enters correct email and password..................................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed And user accepts the agreement..............................................passed When user clicks on checkout button.........................................passed And user fills all fields...................................................passed And user click on continue button...........................................passed And user select delivery method and click continue button...................passed And user select payment method and click continue button....................passed And user click continue button..............................................passed And user click confirm button...............................................passed Then order is processed successfully........................................passed
